paper.title: Financial Prediction of the Shanghai Stock Index Using Support Vector Machines
paper.abstract: A keen interest of investors and the government is to predict the evolution of stock prices. Support vector machines (SVMs) are particularly promising methods for the prediction of financial variables because they use a risk function consisting of an empirical error and a standardized term derived from structural risk minimization. This paper applies SVM to financial forecasting and examines the feasibility of applying the methodology by comparing it with alternative forecasting methods. We conclude with remark of policy significance to the Chinese stock market and its investors.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究使用支持向量机（SVM）预测上海股票指数的演变，虽然涉及金融预测，但并未明确指出其核心技术应用于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等特定金融领域。
